const response = await client.indices.create({
  index: "my-rank-vectors-bit",
  mappings: {
    properties: {
      my_vector: {
        type: "rank_vectors",
        element_type: "bit",
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);

const response1 = await client.bulk({
  index: "my-rank-vectors-bit",
  refresh: "true",
  operations: [
    {
      index: {
        _id: "1",
      },
    },

      my_vector: [127, -127, 0, 1, 42],
